include.name: Action_BuildViews
include.description: Is set in script-skinviewtypes-includes.xml to rebuild viewtypes on update and then not again because it will then overwrite the file. Includes file set to not track in github so that it always is blank with just the include to trigger refresh.

include.name: skinvariables-powertray-onload
include.description: Generated include to check if tray menu is visible will override
